sentences: Lõppenud aeg on hea koht uue alguse jaoks.
Kõik küsimused olid lõppenud juba eelneval päeval.
context: The word 'lõppenud' is the past participle form of the Estonian verb 'lõppema', which means 'to end' or 'to finish'. It describes something that has already been completed or concluded. In the dictionary definition provided, it appears in the context of describing a historical event (the Decembrist uprising) as having ended or concluded.
